ml.peya.plugins

クラス Metrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.peya.plugins.Metrics

  • public class Metrics
extends Object
    bStats collects some data for plugin authors.

    Check out https://bStats.org/ to learn more about bStats!

    • ネストされたクラスのサマリー

      ネストされたクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      static class  Metrics.AdvancedBarChart
      Represents a custom advanced bar chart.
      static class  Metrics.AdvancedPie
      Represents a custom advanced pie.
      static class  Metrics.CustomChart
      Represents a custom chart.
      static class  Metrics.DrilldownPie
      Represents a custom drilldown pie.
      static class  Metrics.MultiLineChart
      Represents a custom multi line chart.
      static class  Metrics.SimpleBarChart
      Represents a custom simple bar chart.
      static class  Metrics.SimplePie
      Represents a custom simple pie.
      static class  Metrics.SingleLineChart
      Represents a custom single line chart.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Metrics

        public Metrics(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
               int pluginId)
        Class constructor.
        パラメータ:
        plugin - The plugin which stats should be submitted.
        pluginId - The id of the plugin. It can be found at What is my plugin id?

    • メソッドの詳細

      • sendData

        private static void sendData(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                             com.google.gson.JsonObject data)
                      throws Exception
        Sends the data to the bStats server.
        パラメータ:
        plugin - Any plugin. It's just used to get a logger instance.
        data - The data to send.
        例外:
        Exception - If the request failed.

      • compress

        private static byte[] compress(String str)
                        throws IOException
        Gzips the given String.
        パラメータ:
        str - The string to gzip.
        戻り値:
        The gzipped String.
        例外:
        IOException - If the compression failed.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Checks if bStats is enabled.
        戻り値:
        Whether bStats is enabled or not.

      • addCustomChart

        public void addCustomChart(Metrics.CustomChart chart)
        Adds a custom chart.
        パラメータ:
        chart - The chart to add.

      • startSubmitting

        private void startSubmitting()
        Starts the Scheduler which submits our data every 30 minutes.

      • getPluginData

        public com.google.gson.JsonObject getPluginData()
        Gets the plugin specific data. This method is called using Reflection.
        戻り値:
        The plugin specific data.

      • getServerData

        private com.google.gson.JsonObject getServerData()
        Gets the server specific data.
        戻り値:
        The server specific data.

      • submitData

        private void submitData()
        Collects the data and sends it afterwards.
